topic_name: The woman who unmasked the forger
image_credits: The Morgan Library & Museum, New York. By Paolatrabanco [CC BY-SA 4.0]
topic_description: Art forgery has existed for centuries, but what about a 19th-century forger of medieval art whose unmasked work went on to become more valuable than originals? Mary Wellesley takes us through the detective-like story of the woman who uncovered his deception.
music_credits: James Joshua Otto, Kai Engel, Greg Joy and Neil Cross
